title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 80 - Flammable Wearing Apparel, Fabrics, Related Materials And Interior Furnishings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 80 - Flammable Wearing Apparel, Fabrics, Related Materials And Interior Furnishings

State Regulations

Subpart 80-1 - Findings Of Fact (§ 80-1.1)

Subpart 80-2 - Application (§ 80-2.1)

Subpart 80-3 - Definitions (§ 80-3.1)

Subpart 80-4 - Standards (§ 80-4.1 to 80-4.5)

Subpart 80-5 - Guaranties (§ 80-5.1)

Subpart 80-6 - Exemptions (§ 80-6.1)

Subpart 80-7 - Rate-of-burn Standard For Sleeping Bags (§ 80-7.1 to 80-7.8)

Subpart 80-8 - Specification For Flame Resistant Materials Used In Camping Tentage (§ 80-8.1 to 80-8.7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 80

Statutory authority: General Business Law, §503

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
